lead_paragraph: Pacquiao could face a fine or suspension by Nevada boxing officials for failing to disclose a shoulder injury before his loss to Floyd Mayweather Jr.

headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Boxing; Pacquiao May Face Discipline

snippet: Pacquiao could face a fine or suspension by Nevada boxing officials for failing to disclose a shoulder injury before his loss to Floyd Mayweather Jr.
abstract: Manny Pacquiao could face fine or suspension after failing to disclose shoulder injury ahead of bout with Floyd Mayweather Jr.
